description:
- Try plus features for free!
- New graphics!
- Better animations!
- Better physics!
- All around neater!

The classic sport played around the world by bored cubical workers - Paper Basketball!  Grab your last bad idea, wad it up & take your shot! But be sure to take the breeze from the window into account!  It’s an addicting time waster, that loads up quick for those short breaks when you want a fun little distraction.  Easy to play, hard to master, Office Basketball is addicting and simpleFun is not responsible for lost wages or damage to relationships caused by this game.

--------------------------------------
PLEASE NOTE: This is the “No-Frills Quick Start” version of the game which does NOT include things like difficulty levels, random baskets or annoying co-workers.  

Get new stages, challenges, difficulty levels, and new game modes in the new "Paper Basketball Plus!"
